name: Roubini Macro Associates LLC
membership: IMF, WEF, Council on Foreign Relations
goal: Macro research consultancy firm, helping those interested in my research understand the fundamentals of economies from a macro standpoint - inflation, nation's currency rates, domestic growth, etc.
interests: Budget, Economic and Financial Affairs, Financial Stability, Financial Services and Capital Markets Union , Foreign and Security Policy and Defence, Taxation, Trade, Trans-European Networks
euInitiatives: Research on Europe and the Eurozone - quantitative easing/tightening in the EZ and throughout Europe, election outcomes on economies, policy debates within countries and regions, etc.
